title: BlackRock’s spot BTC ETF tops $720M in daily volume, marking highest level to date
description:
BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF — the iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) — surpassed a record high of $720 million in daily volume on Feb. 14 to take the number one spot in terms of volume, according to data from Coinglass. Commenting on IBIT’s more than $700 million in volume on Feb. 14, Bloomberg ETF analyst Eric […]

The post BlackRock’s spot BTC ETF tops $720M in daily volume, marking highest level to date appeared first on CryptoSlate.
